question: Which of the following Sultan collected 1300 Sanskrit manuscripts from the Jawalamukhi temple?
explanation: Firoz led a campaign against Jajnagar and looted a lot of booty from temples such as the Puri Jagannath temple. He also marched against Nagarkot and made its ruler pay him tributes. During this campaign, the Sultan collected 1300 Sanskrit manuscripts from the Jawalamukhi temple library.
